Main pronunciation 主要发音: yuān

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning injury.

English senses 英语理解: grievance, injustice, wrong

Usage example 用法举例: 冤仇 yuān chóu (rancour)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1965

Shuowen 说文解字: 屈也從兔從冂兔在冂下不得走益屈折也

寃字的基本解释

寃
yuān
古同“冤”。

寃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuān］
［《廣韻》於袁切，平元，影。］
亦作“寃1”。
(1)屈缩，不舒展。
(2)枉曲，冤屈。
(3)冤仇，仇敌。
(4)冤魂。
(5)怨恨。
(6)谓上当；吃亏。
(7)方言。欺骗。

寃字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寃； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页288第03
【正字通】俗冤字。【說文】冖部冤，屈也。从兔，在冖下。【周伯溫曰】俗作寃，非。

寃字的起名意思

暂无。

injustice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuān］
["Guangyun" in Yuanqie, Pingyuan, Shadow. ]
Also referred to as "injustice 1".
(1) Flexion, not stretching.
(2) Wrong, wronged.
(3) Enmity, enemy.
(4) Injustice.
(5) Resentment.
(6) It is deceived; suffers a loss.
(7) Dialects. deceive.
injustice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Liu Zi Department】　Injustice; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 288 No. 03
【Zhengzitong】vulgar injustice. [Said the text] Zhe's injustice is wrong. From the rabbit, under the zhe. [Zhou Bowen said] The vulgar is wronged, not wrong.
